title: By Plane
body: The fastest and most convenient way to reach Puerto Jiménez. Several domestic airlines operate daily flights from San José International Airport.

title: Direct Bus Service
body: Take the Transportes Blanco bus from San José (Caribbean Bus Terminal) directly to Puerto Jiménez. Departs at 12:00 PM daily. Journey time approximately 8 hours.

title: Bus via Golfito
body: Alternative route via Tracopa bus to Rio Claro, then connecting to Golfito. Choose between coastal or mountain routes. Includes a scenic ferry crossing to Puerto Jiménez.

title: Ferry Service
body: Regular ferry service between Golfito and Puerto Jiménez. Multiple departures daily, offering beautiful views of the Golfo Dulce.
